Connect to the internet and activate"

Some experience as Ripley2453, makes it useless for HD video. Bummer!

Hi Tyr3ll!

First of all, thanks for finding this crack! :)

A couple of thing I'd like to point out is that: 

1. This current crack only allows you to import in .MPG files (so far i've tested)

2. When you try to import in .MP4 or MPEG2 generation videos, it explains that the codec is expired and you will need to update it.

3. I checked out the the program folder, it only has a MPG(.ax) codec file.

so...

Is there a way to manually install the MPEG2 and .H264 codecs into the program folder directly instead of trying to rely on the internet update? (which is for paid users)

A alternative I thought of for the rest of you guys is to get a video converter and convert your raw sources into .MPG file to use the program while waiting for a cure by Dr. Tyr,

Hope to hear from you!

Edz

Update (part 1)

- I discovered that you also could import .AVI and .WMV and .MOV video files! 

so seriously guys, give Tyr his well-deserved thanks for this seriously awesome piece of software! 

A million thanks Tyr! :))

I'm running Win7 Ultimate installed on C:. I normally install my programs to D:\Program Files but found PowerDirector would crash if I did this. Installing to main C: drive in the standard Program Files folder cured the problem. Had this problem with a download of a different torrent of version 10, so it is not unique to this torrent. Just saying in case anyone else has had this problem.
